summary: This document is a Durable General Power of Attorney executed by Jeffrey Epstein, granting authority to Darren Indyke to act on his behalf in various financial matters. It outlines the responsibilities of the agent and the conditions under which the Power of Attorney remains effective, including provisions for revocation and modifications.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the principal who grants authority to Darren Indyke through this Power of Attorney document.

persons.name: Darren Indyke
persons.context: Darren Indyke is designated as the agent authorized to act on behalf of Jeffrey Epstein in financial matters as outlined in the Power of Attorney.

connections.description: Jeffrey Epstein appoints Darren Indyke as his agent through the Power of Attorney, granting him authority to manage Epstein's financial affairs.

keyFacts: The Power of Attorney grants Darren Indyke broad authority to manage Jeffrey Epstein's financial affairs, including banking and investment transactions.
The document specifies that it remains effective even if Epstein becomes incapacitated.
Darren Indyke is required to act in the best interest of Jeffrey Epstein and maintain separate records of transactions.
The Power of Attorney revokes any prior Powers of Attorney executed by Epstein.
The document includes provisions for modifications and revocation of the Power of Attorney.
